lead_paragraph: An article on Tuesday about Joe Torre’s first regular-season game as manager of the Los Angeles Dodgers misstated, in some editions, the year in which Dave Roberts stole second base for the Boston Red Sox in the ninth inning to start their comeback from a three-games-to-none deficit in the American League Championship Series against Torre’s Yankees. It was 2004, not 2003.
